xmlText.p: ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS — Signed C Alex Avila to a two-year contract.
WASHINGTON NATIONALS — Agreed to terms with C Miguel Montero on a minor league contract.
CLEBURNE RAILROADERS — Sold the contract of RHP Cortland Cox to Los Angeles (AL).
FARGO-MOORHEAD REDHAWKS — Signed RHP Trey McNutt, OF Willie Doll and INF Carlos Triunfel.
WINNIPEG GOLDEYES — Signed RHP Edwin Carl.
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed C Alex Burg.
QUEBEC CAPITALES — Signed RHP Trevor Bayless.
ATLANTA HAWKS — Assigned F Tyler Cavanaugh to Erie (NBAGL).
CHICAGO BULLS — Waived G Quincy Pondexter.
NEW ORLEANS PELICANS — Acquired F Nikola Mirotic and a 2018 second-round draft pick from Chicago for C Omer Asik, Gs Jameer Nelson and Tony Allen, and a future first-round pick.
ATLANTA DREAM — Signed G Renee Montgomery to a multi-year contract.
LOS ANGELES SPARKS — Re-signed G Odyssey Sims and Karlie Samuelson. Signed G Ana Dabovic.
WASHINGTON MYSTICS — Signed G Monique Currie.
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Re-signed WR Kenny Stafford.
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Signed DB Anthony Gaitor. Released QB Dominique Davis.
ANAHEIM DUCKS — Recalled G Reto Berra from San Diego (AHL). Reassigned RW Jared Boll to San Diego.
LOS ANGELES KINGS — Activated G Jonathan Quick from injured reserve. Assigned G Jack Campbell to Ontario (AHL).

AHL — Suspended Tucson D Joel Hanley three games for a slashing incident in a Jan. 27 game against Chicago. Suspended Bridgeport D Patrick Cullity one game for an interference incident in a Jan. 26 game at Springfield.
SACRAMENTO REPUBLIC — Announced the resignation of technical director and coach Paul Buckle. Named Simon Elliott coach.
RICE — Named Joe Ashfield offensive line coach and Robbie Picazo quarterbacks coach.
TENNESSEE TECH — Named Price Partrick director of football operations.
YALE — Named Victoria Chun athletic director.
